main_definition: Television sets (TVs) refer to devices used for viewing broadcast programs, which can sometimes be extended metaphorically in idiomatic expressions.

meanings_and_examples.example: I'm going to watch the football game on my TV.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical expression for a large, overwhelming group or quantity
meanings_and_examples.example: After the market crash, it felt like the whole stock world had gone on television!
